column4: Hi, does anybody know how to 'make' a 32 bit program on 64 bit hardy without getting a 'stubs-32.h no such file or directory error?' Is that caused by a missing library?
I've spent the last 6 hours trying to get Martian to run so I can use an Agere winmodem, no joy yet.
well, it doesn't appear to have been installed properly -- its the package that has that particular .h file
